rukus.text: Indeed gates of the heaven do not open for those who denied Our signs and were arrogant about them, and they do not enter the garden until a camel passes through the eye of the needle, and that is how We punish the guilty ones
Their resting place is hell and above them is a covering, and that is how We punish the wrongdoers
And those who believed and did good works are inhabitants of the garden remaining in there forever, We do not task any person beyond its capability

And We remove whatever resentment that is in their chests, and beneath them rivers flow, and they say: all praise belongs to God, the One who guided us to this, and we were not guided if God did not guide us, certainly our Master's messengers have brought the truth. And they are called out that this is the garden that you inherited it for what you were doing

And inhabitants of the garden call out inhabitants of the fire: we have found that what our Master promised us is true, so did you find what your Master promised is true? They say: yes. Then an announcer among them announced that God's curse is on the wrongdoers
those who obstruct God's way and look for its distortion and they are disbelievers in the hereafter

And between the two of them there is a barrier. And on the heights there are men who recognize everyone by their appearance, and they call out to inhabitants of the garden that have not entered it yet but they hope (to do so): peace (and well-being) upon you
And when their eyes are turned towards inhabitants of the fire, they say: our Master, do not put us with the wrongdoing group
